sections.title: Size
sections.content:
Use standard Tailwind to control the size of the text so that you can more easily adapt to different screen sizes.
Larger text size
Default text size
Smaller text
examples: <flux:text class="text-base">Base text size</flux:text><flux:text>Default text size</flux:text><flux:text class="text-xs">Smaller text</flux:text>

sections.title: Color
sections.content:
Use the variant and color props to adjust the text color based on its importance and context.
Strong text color
Default text color
Subtle text color
Colored text
examples: <flux:text variant="strong">Strong text color</flux:text><flux:text>Default text color</flux:text><flux:text variant="subtle">Subtle text color</flux:text><flux:text color="blue">Colored text</flux:text>

sections.title: Link
sections.content:
Use the link component to create clickable text that navigates to other pages or resources.
Visit our documentation for more information.

sections.title: Link variants
sections.content:
Links can be styled differently based on their context and importance.
Default link
Ghost link
Subtle link
examples: <flux:link href="#">Default link</flux:link><flux:link href="#" variant="ghost">Ghost link</flux:link><flux:link href="#" variant="subtle">Subtle link</flux:link>

sections.title: Link as button
sections.content: Use the as="button" prop to render the link as a button.
